title: Pixel 4a issues after March 5 2021 update
content:
After I updated my pixel 4a to march 5 2021 my phone got so many issues and bugs and problems like:
-opening my phone using the fingerprint scanner or the power button takes too long, almost 3sec.
-sometimes the volume toggle will not appear if I press the volume bottons.
-sometimes can't go back because the swipe to go back will not work.

if anyone else have those problems after this update, please let me know, and if anyone have a solution i would like to know too.
